item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Jeff, an offensive security professional and malware developer.

Current Focus

I’m actively developing bazzy, while learning maldev and Nim.

Contact & Connect

  • Twitter: @_jeffaf
  • Bluesky: @jeffaf
  • GitHub: jeffaf

item.title: Projects
item.description:
CVE-2025-3464 AsIO3 LPE

BYOVD LPE exploit for ASUS AsIO3.sys - TOCTOU auth bypass + PreviousMode decrement to steal SYSTEM tokens on Windows 11. AI-assisted exploit development. Research credit: Cisco Talos.

MacProbe

A lightweight C-based macOS security auditing tool. Detects VM environments, checks SIP/Gatekeeper status, enumerates TCC permissions, and identifies dangerous entitlement combinations.

rexx

A cyberpunk-themed mobile app for checking email breaches using the HaveIBeenPwned API. Cross-platform React Native/Expo app with neon UI.
